title: Week In Politics: Immigration, Violent Extremism Summit
teaser: Audie Cornish reviews the week in politics with regular commentators E.J. Dionne of The Washington Post and Brookings Institution and David Brooks of The New York Times. They discuss immigration, the summit on countering violent extremism and 2016 contenders.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
